name: Honeybee Havoc
description:
(Made in 1 week for the 2017 Little Awful Game Jam with the theme "Panic!")
Control a swarm of angry bees and sting the humans threatening your nest! Use your mouse to guide the swarm, gathering nectar and returning to the hive to get more bees. Each time a bee stings someone it dies, so be careful not to run out!
